The Chosen of Shar

The Chosen of Shar is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. The Chosen of Shar can be acquired from Shadowheart during Act 1. Completing The Chosen of Shar will progress Shadowheart's story progression forward and is a subquest of The Daughter of Darkness.
